Barbeque Catering

Summer sun and apparently thunderstorms, but when did that ever stop us Brits?

Contact UsOrder Now

Our BBQ package means that rain or shine, you can sit back and relax with a personal chef keeping an eye on the barbie.

From seitan to steak and everything in between, hunks of halloumi and a whole host of mouth-watering sides, this is a far cry from a pack of sausages and a bag of bread rolls.

Think marinated meats and salads piled high with colour and flavour, dressed to perfection.

Sit back and relax with friends, chatting into the small hours or steal away quiet moments that would otherwise be spent staring at the underside of a burger.

Let us transform your summer nights with our BBQ package and enjoy those long-awaited reunions…

More Feasted

Are barbeques not your thing? Take a look at some of our other catering packages:

BOARD

We’ve created seasonal takeaway boards that boast bold favours and gorgeous combinations. Bookable for occasions or ‘just because’ this isn’t your average takeaway and we work with local farmers and creatives to use ingredients that are rich and readily available, supporting other businesses as well as bringing you amazing food.

Corporate

Available for up to thirty people, we cater for your team in a different kind of way.

Busting boredom and cooking up the tastiest of creations, we can set up kitchen in your workspace or we have a range of kitchens that we can book for the activity.

Once Upon A Plate

Gather your friends, gather your family and sit back for an evening of indulgence and magic.

Once upon a Plate is a private dining experience like no other. We work with you to learn about your event or occasion and note the stories and tales that you tell us around your attendees. We will weave this into the story of the food, creating a totally bespoke menu for you and your guests.

Contact Us

Seen something that has tickled your tastebuds? We would love to hear from you. No idea is too big or too small so use the form below to send us a message.

Social Media

You can follow us on socials too so you can keep up-to-date with our collaborations and concoctions. Take it easy!

Mailing List

Plate lifters of the world unite! Join our mailing list to receive free recipes, stories from us and plenty other of exciting things.
